contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Mudug |native_name = |other_name = |nickname = |motto = |settlement_type =[[Administrative divisions of Somalia|Region]] |image_skyline =Galkpriv.jpg |imagesize = |image_caption =A residential area in [[Galkayo]]. |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_shield = |image_map =Somalia regions map Mudug.svg |mapsize =250px |map_caption =Location in Somalia. |coordinates_display =inline,title |coordinates_region =SO |subdivision_type =Country |subdivision_name ={{flag|Somalia}}<br> *{{flag|Puntland}} *{{flag|Galmudug}} |subdivision_type1 = |subdivision_name1 = |seat_type =Capital |seat =[[Galkayo]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = |population_as_of = |population_note = |population_total = |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[East Africa Time|EAT]] |utc_offset =+3 |latd=6|latm=6|lats=47|latNS=N |longd=47|longm=59|longs=17|longEW=E |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Mudug''' ({{lang-so|''Mudug''}}) is an administrative region (''[[Administrative divisions of Somalia|gobol]]'') in north-central [[Somalia]].<ref name="Staros">[http://www.statoids.com/uso.html Regions of Somalia]</ref> ==Overview== It is bordered by the [[Ogaden]], the Somali regions of [[Nugal, Somalia|Nugal]] and [[Galguduud]], and the [[Indian Ocean]]. The provincial capital is [[Galkayo]]. ==Districts== The Mudug region consists of the following districts:<ref name="Stados">[http://www.statoids.com/yso.html Districts of Somalia]</ref> *[[Gaalkacyo District]] *[[Galdogob District]] *[[Harardheere District]] *[[Hobyo District]] *[[Jariiban District]] ==Major towns== *[[Bacaadweyne]] *[[Galdogob]] *[[Galkayo]] *[[Hobyo]] ==Notes== {{reflist}} {{Somalia_Regions}} [[Category:Regions of Somalia]] [[Category:Mudug| ]] {{Somalia-geo-stub}}
